message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to own something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I understand that $200 is a bit steep, but $120 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'd need to get at least $180 for the product. Would you be willing to consider that?
I'm still interested in the product, but $180 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $140, can you consider that?
I'm getting closer to your price, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $160. Would you be willing to consider that?
I'm getting close, but I'm still not comfortable with $160. I'm willing to pay $145, can you meet me there?
I'm almost there, but I still need to make a bit more. I'm willing to meet you at $155. Would you be willing to consider that?
I'm really close to my limit, but I'm still not comfortable with $155. I'm willing to pay $140, that's the lowest I can go. Can you meet me there?

I'm not willing to go any lower than $155, as that's the minimum I can accept. I'm willing to hold out for that price, but I'm also aware that John is waiting to buy the product for $150. If you're not willing to meet me at $155, I'll have to consider other options.
